title: Vaanathaiye Etti Pudippen Lyrics Vazhakku Enn 18/9
stanzas:
un kannakuli azhaginilthaan
en karpanaiya naan valarthen
un nenjukuli meethuthaandi
en nimmadhiya naan podhachchen

adi penne neeyum pen thaano
illai Bhramman seidha
silaithaano. (2)

manalil katti vaitha koattai
adhai mazhai vandhu
karaiththathenna.

enakkul katti vaitha koattai
adhai nee vandhu
udaithathenna.

ul nenjam enakkulle
ayyo un peyarai solgirathe
ennai vittu uyir pogum
andha uyir vandhu
unnai serum.

mezhugu pol uruginene
nee theeyaaga suttathinaal
neerinil moolgi kondu
naan neerukku alainthene

kan paartha paarvaigalai
un udhadugal poi sollalaam
kaanal neer kandathai
en idhayathil maraindhidumo

pulli vaithu kolam pottaal
nalla siththiram aagidumaa
